spec_data.Name: python2-num2words
spec_data.Description:
Convert numbers to words in multiple languages, it is a library that
converts numbers like ``42`` to words like ``forty-two``.
It supports multiple languages (English, French, Spanish, German and Lithuanian)
and can even generate ordinal numbers like ``forty-second`` for Python 2.

Provides: python-num2words = 0.5.4-3.fc27
Obsoletes: python-num2words < 0.5.4-3.fc27
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 02:20:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Python 3 modules to convert numbers to words
